summary: This is an email exchange between Gloria Allred and an unidentified recipient regarding an Epstein victim's request to travel to New York for a hearing. The victim has secured childcare and needs contact information to arrange travel. The document shows victim coordination efforts shortly after Epstein's death.

persons.name: Gloria Allred
persons.context: Attorney communicating about an Epstein victim's travel arrangements to attend a hearing in New York.

events.title: Hearing in New York
events.description: A hearing is scheduled for Tuesday, August 27, 2019, which an Epstein victim wishes to attend.

keyFacts: An Epstein victim contacted Gloria Allred on August 25, 2019, seeking to attend a hearing in New York on August 27, 2019.
The victim had secured childcare and needed to arrange travel, indicating active participation in legal proceedings.
The email shows victim coordination efforts occurring shortly after Jeffrey Epstein's death in August 2019.
Gloria Allred, a prominent attorney known for representing victims, was involved in assisting this victim.
